critique: This document is an executive order amending Schedules A and B of the Civil Service Rules. It details positions excepted from competitive examination and those that may be filled upon noncompetitive examination. The document itself doesn't express a clear ideological stance. It focuses on the practical aspects of government employment and personnel management. There's no direct impact on immigration, civil liberties, or social inclusion. The document seems neutral regarding executive power, federalism, and economic regulation. Therefore, most scores should be close to zero.
